materials: Large Household Appliances; Refrigerators
notes: The Bureau of Sanitation collects large metal and household appliances, such as refrigerators, washers, dryers, and dishwashers, from all residents serviced by the City of Los Angeles, free of charge. When discarding a refrigerator remember to remove or safely secure the door shut with rope or duct tape to prevent accidents. To make arrangements to have these items collected call at least one day before your regular collection day, or visit website for online service form.
